metadata.title: CVE-2024-9398 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: By checking the result of calls to `window.open` with specifically setprotocol handlers, an attacker could determine if the application whichimplements that protocol handler is installed. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird < 128.3, and Thunderbird <131.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
